title: Father
subject_group: Crime, Espionage, Justice, Police & Prisons/War crimes
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Children - Family relationships
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Fathers and daughters
Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/World War, 1939-1945 - Atrocities - Drama
abstract: A tragic and emotionally charged film that confronts repercussions of the Holocaust and survival. Courtesy of Umbrella Entertainment.
description: Internationally renowned Max von Sydow heads a cast of acclaimed actors, including Carol Drinkwater, Julia Blake and Steve Jacobs, in this powerfully moving film. It tells the story of a family whose lives are shattered when their elderly father is accused of being a Nazi war criminal. Torn between family love and loyalty and the devastating realities of wartime Nazi Germany, all relationships are tested to the limit. Photography by Dan Burstall. AFI Awards were won by Max von Sydow and Julia Blake.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: VoD Program; B2002497; The Deluxe/Kodak Collection; Active; 2012
